top.title: Hong Kong court jails media tycoon and British citizen Jimmy Lai for 20 years
top.summary: Lai's supporters say this amounts to a death sentence, but authorities say it demonstrates the rule of law.

top.title: Maxwell refuses to answer questions about Epstein in congressional hearing
top.summary: Ghislaine Maxwell, the jailed associate of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, invoked her Fifth Amendment right to avoid self-incrimination.

top.title: Epstein survivors call for full release of files in video
top.summary: Millions of files relating to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein have been released by the DOJ but many have redactions.

top.title: Discord to start requiring face scan or ID to access adult content
top.summary: The online chat service, which has 200 million monthly users, will blur adult content by default.

top.title: AI chatbots pose 'dangerous' risk when giving medical advice, study suggests
top.summary: It found people using AI for health reasons found it hard to identify what advice they should trust.

top.title: EU tells Meta to let rivals run AI chatbots on WhatsApp
top.summary: A Meta spokesperson said the EU had "no reason" to intervene over it changing the app in January.

title.#text: Apple is killing the old HomeKit tomorrow
AI-generated ads dropped the ball at this year’s Super Bowl
Ferrari’s first EV will have an interior designed by Jony Ive
